Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering it to you at this exclusive price, hoping to share its benefits with someone who appreciates it as much as I do. Would you like to make this offer yours? 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180.

(2) Reject Alice's offer
